24000.name: Temple Entrance - Submerged Archway
24000.description:
Massive stone pillars, encrusted with barnacles and sea anemones, frame a
yawning archway that descends into darkness. The water here is murky, tinged
green with algae. Ancient runes glow faintly along the lintel, their magic
still holding after millennia beneath the waves. Bubbles stream upward from
cracks in the stonework.

zone_mechanic.message: Your lungs burn as the water presses in around you!

down.description: The archway descends into the flooded temple.

up.description: A flooded passage ascends to the coastal caves.

24001.name: Flooded Grand Hall
24001.description:
This was once a magnificent ceremonial hall. Towering columns of blue-veined
marble rise from the silted floor, their capitals carved with leaping dolphins
and crashing waves. Schools of luminescent fish dart between the pillars,
casting eerie shifting light across the mosaic floor depicting Nereus rising
from the deep.

south.description: Coral growths frame a southern passage.

east.description: A narrow crack in the wall leads east.

24002.name: Coral Garden - Air Pocket
24002.description:
A magnificent underwater garden sprawls before you, alive with swaying sea
fans, branching staghorn coral, and luminous jellyfish drifting lazily overhead.
Most remarkably, a large air pocket is trapped beneath an overhanging dome of
brain coral. You can breathe freely here, and the sweet taste of fresh air is
almost intoxicating after the crushing depths.

zone_mechanic.message: You gulp fresh air gratefully. The drowning pressure fades.

south.description: A winding path through the coral.

24003.name: Dark Corridor of the Drowned
24003.description:
The corridor walls are lined with alcoves, each containing the skeletal remains
of ancient priests, their bony hands still clutching rusted ceremonial tridents.
Phosphorescent moss clings to the ceiling, casting a sickly green glow. The
water here is colder, and a faint current tugs at your legs.

24004.name: Coral Labyrinth
24004.description:
Towering formations of living coral create a bewildering maze. Brain coral
the size of boulders blocks direct paths, while delicate fire coral lines
narrow gaps that sting the unwary. Moray eels peer from dark crevices with
malevolent eyes. The water pulses with bioluminescent light.

east.description: A gap in the coral wall.

24005.name: Tidal Surge Chamber
24005.description:
This circular chamber acts as a junction for powerful tidal currents. Water
rushes through channels cut into the walls, creating a roaring vortex in the
center. Debris and bones swirl in the maelstrom. Doorways lead in several
directions, each fighting against the relentless pull of the water.

east.description: A reinforced doorway to the east.

24006.name: Sahuagin Barracks
24006.description:
Crude sleeping pallets made of woven kelp line the walls of this repurposed
temple chamber. Weapons racks hold coral-tipped spears and jagged shell blades.
The Sahuagin have made this their forward base, and the water reeks of fish
blood and violence. Trophy skulls of surface-dwellers adorn the walls.

24007.name: Pressure Chamber
24007.description:
The walls of this narrow chamber press inward, the stone groaning under
immense oceanic pressure. Cracks spiderweb across the ceiling, and jets of
high-pressure water shoot across the room at random intervals. The pressure
here is crushing, making every movement an effort of will.

zone_mechanic.message: The crushing pressure squeezes the life from your body!

24008.name: Kelp Forest Chamber
24008.description:
Giant kelp rises from the floor like an underwater forest, swaying hypnotically
in unseen currents. Visibility drops to nearly nothing within the dense fronds.
Something large moves through the kelp ahead — you catch glimpses of scales
and fins before it vanishes again.

24009.name: Sunken Reliquary
24009.description:
Stone shelves line the walls of this sacred chamber, holding corroded relics
of the old faith. A large altar of black basalt dominates the center, its
surface carved with waves and sea serpents. Something glints within a niche
behind the altar. The water here tastes of ancient magic.

24010.name: Flooded Processional
24010.description:
A wide processional way stretches before you, flanked by statues of mer-priests
in attitudes of worship. Their stone eyes seem to follow your passage. The
mosaic floor depicts the journey of souls to Nereus's undersea paradise.
Sediment swirls with each step, obscuring ancient patterns.

24011.name: Sea Witch's Sanctum
24011.description:
Curtains of woven seaweed partition this chamber into a series of grottos.
Bubbling cauldrons of glowing green liquid sit atop coral pedestals, tended
by schools of enchanted fish. Shelves of jars contain preserved eyes, tentacles,
and other unspeakable components. Dark magic saturates the water here.

south.description: A hidden passage behind the shelves.

24012.name: Sahuagin War Room
24012.description:
A large table of polished shell dominates this chamber, its surface etched
with crude maps of the surrounding waters and coastal settlements. Sahuagin
commanders plot their raids here, pushing carved bone tokens across the map.
Battle trophies — helms, shields, and severed heads — line the walls.

24013.name: Deep Trench Access - Air Pocket
24013.description:
The passage opens into a natural cave where a massive air pocket has formed
beneath a dome of volcanic rock. Stalactites drip fresh water from above,
and the air, while stale, is breathable. A trench drops away to the south,
plunging into abyssal darkness. You can rest here and catch your breath.

zone_mechanic.message: You surface into the air pocket and breathe deeply.

24014.name: Merfolk Graveyard
24014.description:
Rows of coral-encrusted sarcophagi stretch across the ocean floor, the final
resting place of ancient merfolk royalty. Many have been broken open, their
contents scattered by looters or darker forces. Ghostly blue lights flicker
above the disturbed graves. The corrupted dead do not rest easily here.

24015.name: Hall of the Tides
24015.description:
Four massive fountains — impossible underwater, yet functioning through pure
magic — shoot streams of glowing water toward a central vortex. The room
pulses with tidal energy, and the currents shift unpredictably. Ancient
merfolk used this chamber to commune with the ocean itself.

24016.name: Treasure Vault Antechamber
24016.description:
Heavy bronze doors, green with verdigris, stand ajar. The locking mechanism —
an ingenious system of coral gears and shell tumblers — has been smashed by
brute force. Beyond, you can see the gleam of gold through the murky water.
Guards have been posted. Whatever remains inside is still well-defended.

24017.name: Flooded Armory
24017.description:
Racks of weapons stand in orderly rows — tridents, harpoons, nets weighted
with lead. Many have been claimed by the Sahuagin, but some ancient merfolk
weapons remain, their enchantments still faintly glowing through the rust
and coral growth. A strong current flows from the south.

24018.name: The Abyssal Trench
24018.description:
The trench plunges into darkness so absolute that even magical light struggles
to penetrate. Bioluminescent creatures drift past — anglerfish with lantern
lures, translucent jellyfish trailing stinging tendrils. The pressure here
is immense, and strange sounds echo from below: groaning, clicking, something
vast shifting in its sleep.

zone_mechanic.message: The abyssal pressure threatens to crush you!

24019.name: Inner Sanctum - Air Pocket
24019.description:
The inner sanctum of the temple is dominated by a massive statue of Nereus,
trident raised, carved from a single piece of aquamarine. A divine air pocket
surrounds the statue — the god's last gift to his faithful. You can breathe
freely here. The statue's eyes glow with residual divine power.

zone_mechanic.message: The blessing of Nereus fills your lungs with sweet air.

24020.name: Treasure Vault of Nereus
24020.description:
Mountains of gold coins, encrusted with coral and sea growth, fill this
vast chamber. Jeweled scepters, pearl necklaces, and enchanted artifacts
glitter through the murky water. This was the offering vault of the temple,
where worshippers left tribute to the sea god. Much has been looted, but
some treasures remain hidden beneath the silt.

24021.name: Collapsed Wing
24021.description:
This section of the temple has partially collapsed. Massive stone blocks
lean against each other at precarious angles, creating a labyrinth of
narrow crawlspaces. Sand and debris choke the lower passages. Somewhere
ahead, a faint current suggests a way through the rubble.

24022.name: The Kraken's Grotto
24022.description:
An enormous natural cavern opens before you, its walls scarred by the passage
of something immense. Shattered ship hulls and whale bones litter the floor.
The water here is thick with ink, reducing visibility to mere feet. A massive
tentacle slowly unfurls from the darkness ahead. You have found the Kraken's
lair.

24023.name: Sanctum of the Deep
24023.description:
This sacred chamber lies at the very heart of the temple. The walls are
covered in murals depicting the creation of the ocean, still vivid despite
the millennia. A massive stone altar stands before a whirlpool that descends
into the earth itself. The water hums with power. This is where Nereus
once walked among mortals.

24024.name: The Kraken's Throne Room
24024.description:
At the absolute deepest point of the temple, where divine architecture meets
natural cavern, sits a throne of fused coral and bone — the seat of the Kraken
itself. The beast has claimed this sacred place as its own, wrapping its massive
tentacles around the pillars like a living nightmare. Ancient treasures are
woven into its nest. The water throbs with each beat of its three hearts.

east.description: A black trench opens east into the Drowned Reliquary.

24001.name: sahuagin warrior
24001.long_desc: A Sahuagin warrior snarls at you, brandishing a coral-tipped spear.
24001.description:
This fish-headed humanoid stands over six feet tall, its scaled body rippling
with lean muscle. Razor-sharp claws tip its webbed fingers, and rows of needle
teeth fill its gaping maw. Cold, predatory intelligence gleams in its black eyes.

24002.name: sea witch
24002.long_desc: A Sea Witch hovers in the water, dark magic swirling around her claws.
24002.description:
Part merfolk, part something far darker, this creature has traded beauty for
power. Her lower body is that of a moray eel, and her fingers end in venomous
barbs. Stolen souls swirl in jars at her belt, and her eyes glow with stolen magic.

24003.name: corrupted merfolk
24003.long_desc: A corrupted merfolk drifts here, its eyes vacant and body twisted.
24003.description:
Once beautiful, this merfolk has been twisted by dark magic into a grotesque
parody of its former self. Its scales are blackened and peeling, its tail
split and malformed. It attacks with mindless ferocity, any trace of its
former intelligence drowned in corruption.

24004.name: giant crab
24004.long_desc: A giant crab clicks its massive pincers menacingly.
24004.description:
This monstrous crustacean is the size of a wagon, its shell encrusted with
barnacles and coral. Its pincers could snap a man in half, and its beady
black eyes swivel independently, tracking multiple threats at once.

24005.name: sea witch elder
24005.long_desc: A Sea Witch Elder chants dark incantations, tentacles writhing.
24005.description:
Ancient beyond reckoning, this sea witch has fused with an octopus, her
lower body a mass of powerful tentacles. She commands the darkest currents
of ocean magic, and the water itself bends to her will.

24006.name: the Kraken
24006.long_desc: THE KRAKEN towers before you, a nightmare of tentacles and destruction!
24006.description:
Words fail to capture the horror before you. The Kraken is a living mountain
of muscle and malice. Its body fills the cavern, tentacles thick as ancient
oaks coiling and uncoiling endlessly. Each sucker is ringed with razor-sharp
hooks. Its beak could shatter a warship, and its eyes — ancient, intelligent,
and utterly merciless — fix upon you with terrible hunger. This is the apex
predator of the deep, and you are in its domain.

24001.name: Trident of the Deep
24001.room_desc: A magnificent trident pulses with oceanic power here.

24002.name: Coral Plate Armor
24002.short_desc: a suit of Coral Plate Armor
24002.room_desc: A suit of shimmering coral plate armor lies here.

24003.name: Pearl of Water Breathing
24003.room_desc: A luminous pearl glows softly on the ground.
